name: Kill my Tower
description:
Kill my Tower is will be a tower builder and destruction game. Build your tower to defend the treasure inside, invent traps and other contraptions to keep it save. Then send it to a friend to challenge him to get to the treasure in under a minute, see the replay and if he actually gets to your treasure revenge your tower by destroying his.

Disclaimer: This is still in active development! Please leave a comment what you think or if you encounter any issues so far.

Controls

  • WASD to move
  • Space to jump
  • Mouse to look
  • hold right mouse button or alt key to pick up material
  • click left mouse button to nail
  • hold ctrl key to keep the material still

Known Issues

  • crosshair is not quite centered on all screens
  • pause menu requires multiple escape presses to get a cursor
